service_figures: Indus Net Technologies Limited (INT) has developed INT Origin, a comprehensive insurance management platform designed to enhance the operations of insurance companies. This platform serves the entire B2B insurance ecosystem, including Managing General Agents (MGAs), brokers, underwriters, auditors, and claims handlers. INT Origin aims to streamline insurance management by providing a unified, scalable, and customizable system that addresses common industry challenges such as fragmented systems and manual processes. The platform includes functionalities for policy management, claims processing, and regulatory compliance, ensuring efficient operations and improved customer satisfaction.
